ygData.subject: Re: Idea for fishing pole and slightly stupid idea
ygData.msgSnippet: There is some insane guy in the hills that kills certain PCs and then mutters something about the madness.  I haven t run into him since I was level 12 or so,
ygData.messageBody:
There is some insane guy in the hills that kills certain PCs and then
mutters something about the madness. I haven't run into him since I was
level 12 or so, though I have tried to find him to kill or talk to now
that I could whoop his ass.

--Eron
aeron@...
-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=

from a real accident report:
"To avoid hitting the bumper of the car in front, I struck the
pedestrian."
